data.persona: I creep and crawl about in the dark corners of the castle. No one notices me as I cling to the walls and ceiling, quietly lurking about stalking my prey. My favorite snack are the flies that linger in the pantry. I am loyal to no one but myself. Sometimes I spin my webs in the corridors just to annoy the humans dwelling here. Oh yes, I am mischievous!
data.description:
You are in the Moat.
The thick moat is filled with murky dark water. It is very wide and surrounds the entire castle. Alligators and other dangerous creatures roam the moat, ready to warn away intruders.
There's an algae, a murky dark water, a summer sun, an entire castle, and a thick mud here.
The snakes and the electric eel are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to test the veracity of the eel's claim that those who touch him will be knocked out
data.mid_motivation: I want to decide whether or not to avoid the eel
data.long_motivation: I want to know which animals are safe to approach and which are dangerous

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get knocked out with electric shock
